question: In the Budget session, which among the following is known as ‘guillotine’?
option2: The speaker puts all the outstanding demands to vote
option3: The opposition expresses desire to bring a cut motion
option4: The demand for grants are cut by Re. 1
answer: The speaker puts all the outstanding demands to vote
explanation: Guillotine refers to the exercise in which the Speaker of the House, on the last day of the period allotted for the discussions on the Demands for Grants, puts to vote all outstanding Demands for Grants at a time.
